title: IG Group boss plans to cash in, lie back and relax
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now IG Group boss plans to cash in, lie back and relax Tim Howkins will stand down as chief executive in October Chris Harris/The Times Tim Howkins will stand down as chief executive in October Chris Harris/The Times Harry Wilson City Editor Published 1 minute ago 
IG Group’s chief executive unveiled a surprise plan to step down after a 16-year career at the spread-betting group yesterday as its annual profits slid sharply in the wake of the abrupt surge in the value of the Swiss franc. 
Shares in IG fell by almost 7 per cent, closing 55p lower at 752p, after Tim Howkins, who has overseen rapid growth at the business, said that he wanted to take a two-year career break.
